reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on specific architectural and material cues. Desc_1 was uniquely identified by the long layout and built-in display cabinets (Image_1). The three main rooms (Desc_2, Desc_3, Desc_9) were differentiated by lighting and ceiling features: Desc_3 required good natural light and a decorative ceiling (Image_3); Desc_9 required a windowless, rectangular space (Image_9); and Desc_2 was the remaining narrow room with visible pre-wiring (Image_2). The three wet areas were distinguished by function and age: Desc_6 was the narrow, toilet-only space (Image_6); Desc_4 and Desc_8 were the two modern wet/dry bathrooms (Image_4 and Image_8, which are visually almost identical but assigned sequentially). The stairwells (Desc_10 and Desc_12) were separated based on the presence of wooden stair treads (Image_12 for Desc_12) versus standard treads (Image_10 for Desc_10). Desc_5 was clearly the old, tiled area with a kitchenette and stairs (Image_5). Desc_11 was matched to the small room with peeling green floor and old tiles (Image_11). Desc_13 was the only semi-outdoor space with a metal roof and cement floor (Image_13).

matching_result_list.evidence: Open, long layout (開放長型格局) with existing cabinets/display cases (已有櫃體收納) and tile floor (磁磚地面).
Narrow room (狹長型格局) with wood grain floor, recessed lighting, and visible coiled wires (已預留線路) on the wall.
Good natural light (前方採光佳) from large windows, wood floor, AC, and a distinct decorative ceiling section (天花造型區塊).
Modern bathroom with wet/dry separation (乾濕分離) via a glass enclosure and light-colored tiles (淺色磁磚).
Area featuring stairs (動線多樓梯), fully tiled walls (牆面全貼磁磚), a low ceiling, and a visible simple kitchenette (有簡易廚房), showing an old feel.

tag_list: 空間可作餐廳或工作區

matching_result_list.evidence: Extremely narrow space (空間狹窄) configured as toilet only (純廁所配置) with old, small square tiles.
Hallway (走道) with continuous wood grain floor (木紋地板一體延伸) and recessed lighting, connecting to a room and a utility/bathroom door.
Second modern bathroom with wet/dry separation (乾濕分離) and neutral color scheme (中性色調), visually similar to Image 4.
Rectangular room (規則矩形格局) with wood floor and uniform recessed lighting, notably lacking any visible external windows (無對外窗可見).
Public stairwell (公共梯間) with tile floor and metal railing, lacking the specific wooden treads mentioned in Desc_12.

tag_list: 可加設鞋櫃或機車用品櫃

matching_result_list.evidence: Small room (空間較小) with old wall tiles (牆面老舊磁磚), a small window, and a clearly damaged/peeling green floor (地面剝落需重作).
Public stairwell (公共梯間) with good lighting and distinct wooden stair treads (樓梯採木踏板).
Large semi-outdoor area (大面積露臺) with a rough cement floor (地面粗糙水泥) and a metal sheet roof (有遮雨鐵皮頂).
